channel.title: The Straits Times Singapore News
channel.description: The Straits Times - Get exclusive stories, in-depth analyses and award-winning multimedia content about Singapore, Asia and the world.

item.title: Lawyer fined $5,600 for role in housing loan scam involving more than $2 million
item.description:
June 11, 2020 12:02 AM

SINGAPORE - A lawyer pleaded guilty and was fined $5,600 on Wednesday (June 10) for his role in a housing loan scam involving $2.32 million for the purchase of a house in Saraca Terrace off Yio Chu Kang Road.
